reviewText: A favourite film of mine from long ago that still carries tremendous political punch.
one of the best movies ever made. Tense, perverse, very perverse, in all senses. Of course the bigest one is the sistem itself.

Impressive Italian thriller/giallo starring beautiful Florinda Bolkan (Anonymous Venetian; Brief Vacation; Lizard in a Woman's Skin) and Gian Maria Volonté (Fistful of Dollars+Few Dollars More; Christ Stopped at Eboli etc.)
very good print! / Italian audio only - with English subs (optional)

Film: 8/10
Picture quality: 9/10
Aspect ratio: 1.85:1 (orig.)
BD 50 GB
Audio: Italian
ST: Italian; GB o/-
Label: Lucky Red
